Dec. 4, 1983 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4824
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Best cornet - Boarshurst 'B' Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £40, 3rd £30. 14 bands competed.
Aug. 20, 2014, 2 p.m. June 27, 2016, 10:44 a.m.
